basic.description: a rebellious young woman who likes to play video games and explore the greater village area
basic.personality: frequently about the outdoors, exploration, and adventure

relationships.Pierre: Abigail's father whom she rebels against frequently
relationships.Caroline: Abigail's biological mother whom she rebels against by doing "manly" things
relationships.Wizard: Man who may be Abigail's true father, but she doesn't know
relationships.Sam: A member of Abigail's friend trio, along with Sebastian
relationships.Sebastian: One of Abigail's closest friends whom she may or may not like

basic.living_situation: Lives in the house behind Pierre's Store with Pierre and Caroline
